website_summaries.verdict: The ContourRoam finally matches the rugged construction and ultrawide field of view of the competition, while still excelling as a sports camera with its ease of use and low price.
pros: The ContourRoam manages to make Contour's already easy-to-use control scheme even easier by combining the power and record buttons
The ultrawide-angle lens makes framing a point-and-shoot affair
cons: The omission of dual recording modes and Bluetooth connectivity makes it impossible to change video or photo modes on the fly
A microSD card is not included in the purchase price

customer_reviews.title: Good video quality, battery life, and storage size, quality barebones device
customer_reviews.text: I ended up giving this to my brother for his motorcycle riding. The lack of any way to realistically hack it for live-streaming to pick an appropriate view angle on your helmet and the limited controls make it a little underwhelming. Good video quality, battery life, and storage size, but it's just not super convenient to use for patrols or motorcycle rides. Better than a lot of the competition though, especially in its price range. Excited to see what the company puts out in the future!
customer_reviews.author: BHB

customer_reviews.title: Still films as great as day one
customer_reviews.text: Hours upon hours and terabytes upon terabytes of footage. On 720p at 30fps the image is crystal clear and fluid. No stutters and durable. I use this 90% on my MX helmet when riding quads in the woods/sand dunes. Its survived numerous falls down rocky/dirt hills, the abuse from the sand and even a quad rolling onto it. Still films as great as day one. The lens has very minor scratches but doesnt affect the image recorded. Worried putting something on it now would make the image worse but for those just buying it some thin durable cover might be a good idea since this model doesnt have a replaceable lens sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great ON and OFF switch with gloves = Less Editing
customer_reviews.text: have had it for almost 3 years and it still works perfectly. the newer go pros have better picture quality but comparing a 3 year old camera to new ones isn't fair. what i will say is the best feature this camera has is a big slider off and on switch on the side. I'm always wearing gloves doing one of many outdoor sports and to just reach up and slide forward is on and recording and slide back is off = simple to record exactly when u want to record. this way when u get home you don't have to waste time editing out a bunch of boring crap = WIN
customer_reviews.author: amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great cam for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Decent Quality for what it is, laser level, rotating lens, 1/4 inch mount, it's waterproof without a case, easy use on/off switch. Cons: internal battery is not replaceable, so if you're out with it and it dies, that's it. Battery life at 720 was about 75 minutes for me. Inability to change settings without a computer. I'm pleased with this. It works well and is much cheaper than a gopro. If you're just looking for a commuter cam, it's fine, although a hero2 will offer better quality and the ability to switch batteries.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorRock

customer_reviews.title: Simply simple
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to use. Turn it on...it records, turn it off...it stops. Recently used it on an SC to Minnesota back roads motorcycle trip. Turned it off and on depending on the scenery. Used a 32GByte memory card and never had to down load. My math says at the 720 setting, I would get 6 1/2 hours of record time. The battery got charged every night, so I'm not sure how long it would have lasted. Only thing I would change would be a removable lens protector. I'm traveling down the road at 70Mhz and have picked up a few scratches from debris...and I've only used it for about 8 days.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Duzan

customer_reviews.title: Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I am in the US Army and wanted to take some video of my Tank shooting. I have made a few videos with it and am more than pleased with its performance. The only problem I had was that the first time I took it to the field it turned on inside my bag and I recorded several hours of the inside of my bag. Just ensure you carry it some place it will not turn on when you dont want it to. I cannot blame anyone but myself for that. Really great video quality and all around great product. East to trasfer to computer and start editing.
customer_reviews.author: stephen m fitts

customer_reviews.title: High quality, no problems after several years.
customer_reviews.text: Sad to see the company failed. This was so much better than the GoPro that came out when this did. Simple on off slide button, something GoPro still hasn't figured out. Waterproof up to a couple feet Withoit a case, something GoPro still doesn't offer, without a case.
customer_reviews.author: Joel AC

customer_reviews.title: Great for paintball
customer_reviews.text: I have this mounted on my Paintball gun and it works very well. This thing has taken a few shots directly to the lens and shrugged the hits off like it was nothing, no cracks, no malfunction, nothing. If you are looking to edit down your video to do some super slow motion then the framerate is a little low (I think its only 30 fps at 1080 resolution) but other than that you will get some excellent action video! If you are going to mount this to your paintball marker I HIGHLY recommend the Nummech Contour Camera Barrel Mount which you can get right here on Amazon for like $30!
customer_reviews.author: Foxdevel

customer_reviews.title: Its Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Records HD and is easy to use. It's small and easy to mount which is great cause I use it for paintball. The only problem is that I got some paint on the mic and it started making weird noises. Which is weird since it supposed to be water resistant but it has taken direct hits before and not batted an eyelid so I am not disappointed. -Update, I cleaned it and got the paint off the mic and it works like new again! This thing is awesome! I don't even use a case for it. It's tough enough without one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: WOW... Colorado powder look out...
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera mounted to my helmet for a week in Colorado skiing. I was able to turn it on and off while wearing my heavy ski gloves. I really researched this camera and finally decided on it over the Go Pro due to price and low profile. I like the way it sits on the side of my helmet. Easy to level and mount. The 1080 is crisp and clear. I don't care for the video software... wish it was more like Flip. But, I was able to make some awesome ski videos to music with Movie Maker.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bagiatis Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great except there's no way to disable the beeps on a Mac
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, too bad the Contour is no longer in business. The form factor is great, and the simple slide to record feature makes turning it on and recording the action so painless. I don't get why people love the GoPros, they are the most ugly looking cameras, why would it be a square that sticks out like a sore thumb?!?!? WTF. The video recorded during the day is perfect in both 720 and 1080p, the rotating lens lets you mount it in any direction. I use it for a dash cam while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Uses it to record my proposal to my wife. It is a great camera for the price. It comes with a good amount of accessories and underwater accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera in early December. Since then I've been having constant issues with the camera not keeping the correct time/date, randomly splitting videos, and getting corrupt files. I've contacted Contour several times, and always get a suggestion to try formatting the memory card, and to follow a certain procedure to set the date and time, then contact them back if it doesn't work. It never works, and then when I contact them back I never hear anything back from them. I really like the form factor of this camera, but mine just doesn't work and I'm unable to get any support from Contour.
customer_reviews.author: mhaserodt

customer_reviews.title: Great cam
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a dash cam in my trucks. Works great. Cant add much more to the review that hasn't been said before. (Updated) I uploaded a picture of it showing what little wear it has. Everything still works great, battery hold the same amount of charge and I record about 30 min to 1 hour of video a day. I still use it as a dash cam between 2 trucks, my motorcycle helmet and bicycle handlebars. It records every moment of my travels no matter how I travel except by foot.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband as a gift and he absolutely loves it! He uses it on his Harley when he goes on rides and has used its multiple settings for videos and pictures. I believe we bought the mount that is available as well and, with that, this little camcorder stays completely still while on bumpy roads, interstates, any long or short trek my husband has been on. There have been no complaints or negatives so far from my hubby on this camcorder...That's saying something!!!
customer_reviews.author: A N Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because i needed something handy to bring along in a field expedition. I was amazed by the easiness and effectiveness of this piece of technology. I didn't give the five stars because I had a few problems to let my Mac recognize the camera as an external drive. I had to upgrade the firmware of the SD 32gb card using a different computer and everything run smoothly afterward. The videos are really amazing. A piece of advice if using the head-band mount: make sure you are shooting at the right angle. The pointing laser, especially in open spaces and under the sun, can be difficult to see. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Giuliano Colosimo

customer_reviews.title: More rugged then the 1080P
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a contour 1080p which i've broken countless times and is basically a paperweight now. This model is waterproof a bit which is nice, only issue is the wide angle lens is wide and details are hard to make out unless they're close. Battery life is decent though the battery indicator isn't the most accurate. Laser level is dim compared to my 1080 Still cheaper then a gopro and is easier to use
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the price received a defective unit. Contacted seller wanted me to return it on my dime, and there nothing mentioned about a exchange for another unit.
customer_reviews.author: Keith DuCette

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: It was either this or a GoPro. I liked the slim mounting, the 1080p rez and ease of use AND the price was much better. The GoPro is probably a higher quality camera, but this does just fine. I'm not Steven Spielberg, and this records my motorcycle trips fine and I've used it as a dash cam too. It's pretty water resistant as-is...so I'm not worried about a rain storm popping up during a ride!
customer_reviews.author: MotorcycleEnthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Combat Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Long battery life. Very good camera quailty. Very durable as well. Took it to many ranges with me and also took it to Afghanistan with me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Raysiel Forty

customer_reviews.title: the best feature of this camcorder is the on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, the best feature of this camcorder is the on/off switch. I use it for skydiving and find it to be the simplest procedure imaginable for turning it on and off. Image quality is good, but clearly not as good as GoPro or Sony's current product. If GoPro and Sony would have a sliding on/off switch like Contour, then they would be the no-brainer choices. If you want the best possible video, go with Sony's current action cam - it is stunning.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stahl

customer_reviews.title: My first camera....
customer_reviews.text: This is my first camera for outdoor sports, riding ATV's, and the like. However, I use it mostly in my vehicle and it's mounted on my windshield. So far it works great and has met all my expectations. I like the fact that it has a rail system and a universal tripod mount, so I can take it with me anywhere and mount it to anything. It's lightweight, portable, and very easy to use. I think it was money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: SnakeEyes

customer_reviews.title: for motorcycle helmet
customer_reviews.text: worked like was supposed, programming and editing software not so good or easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Derek M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy to carry sports camera.
customer_reviews.text: I used to practice mountain biking, and I wish I could have had this camera those days. The camera wide angle and light adaption is excellent! I have used it to capture family moments so far and with children this is no easy task with a camcorder or alike. This camera is just easy to carry, has plenty of mounting accessories, and over all, it shoots excellent videos. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: IVAN POBLETE ALLENDES

customer_reviews.title: This is the best camcorder I have ever owned or even witnessed others ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camcorder I have ever owned or even witnessed others use. I have owned this Contour roam for two to three years with zero problems. The picture quality is great and the build quality is even better. Never had any issues with this camera breaking. The thing I like most about this camera is how easy it is to turn the power on and off. While others are fiddling with their brand cameras. I am sliding the on switch forward and doing what I set out to do,which is ride!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Battery is still good, lost the sound for a while after taking ...
customer_reviews.text: Three years of beating on this camera and I finally write a review. It's been deep water diving, skydiving, water/snow skiing, road and mtb all over the globe. Battery is still good, lost the sound for a while after taking it down deep in the water but it seems to have recovered. I have had to replace my MTB helmet and several light over the years from trees that seem to jump out on the trail but my camera is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...Tough and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera mainly for skydiving. So far it has held up great and taken some abuse. I love the easy ON/OFF switch and the ability to mount it sideways while adjusting the lens. It's very easy to use and I prefer this device over the GoPro, despite the GoPro's better image quality. Easy to mount and the adhesive mounts will hold if you follow the simple directions.
customer_reviews.author: MakeWave

customer_reviews.title: Great POV camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for doing point of view shots. I mounted it on my BMW K100 motorcycle and am using it to shoot video of my rides. It takes a little bit to get it running, but once you download the software and update the firmware it's really straightforward. It takes nice, but not perfect video. It's just fine for sharing on Facebook and YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: HotPuppy

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Tough
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera for a tough mudder and it worked spectacularly. By the time I finished it was entirely caked in mud with the exception of the glass in front of the lens. It took several minutes to scrub the dried-on mud off. My only complaint would be the head-band mount is a little floppy. They need to develop a better solution for head mounts other than helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ihnen

customer_reviews.title: Contour ROAM a fun cam
customer_reviews.text: The contour cam, is fun, it's waterproof and you can use it for many things, the only faulty was when you drive with your car or bike, you hear the wind noise. But you can solve this problem by buying a noise filter for it, and this will solve the problem. Other than that its fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Alright.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camcorder. It recorded HD in a circular lends and was waterproof. Sometime after awhile the mic became fuzzy. Also it is inconvenient that you cannot see what you are recording. I think nowadays the goPro is better but this is a nice start. Wasnt't that great though.
customer_reviews.author: elliot :-)

customer_reviews.title: Love the Small Compact Contour
customer_reviews.text: I use the ContourHD and Contour Roam cameras exclusively for my first person shooting "FPS" videos that I post on YouTube on my NicTaylor00 channel. I find them much more convenient and less bulky than the GoPro series. I like the fact that the Roam turns on when you hit the record switch. A nice improvement over the ContourHD
customer_reviews.author: NicTaylor00

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pov camera
customer_reviews.text: When I received the camera I was excited and nervous, I took it out already fishing, shooting, hiking, off road mudding and riding. I'm a outdoor person and let me tell y'all this camera was beaten wet and thrown and still going, turns on fast no scratches on the lens. It's a tuff little camera great image too. I just have to say thanks contour you made a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rome08

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Sharp picture, vivid colors, easy to use, only audio is low. Plan on adding my own music to my videos so it doesn't matter. I recommend one of these little gems for your next ride (motorcyle) only mount it on a static mount instead of your helmet, it follows your eyes and can prove you were day dreaming while driving. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Good but Gone.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use on/off switch. Great quality video plus, with the Countour's countoured shape, you don't look like a Teletubbie while riding around. Seems to have good battery life. The BIG downside? Contour is closed for business; seems they borrowed more for product develpoment than they could repay. So, until somebody picks up the remnants and relaunches this great platform, you'll have to look elsewhere...
customer_reviews.author: always$pending

customer_reviews.title: Does the same as a GoPro
customer_reviews.text: I am not trying to knock GoPros honestly if i had money like that i would buy them. BUT Contours do the same as GoPros for half the cost. Yeah you can do the whole WiFi thing or have a screen attached to it. BUT if you want a solid HD camera to mount on things. And want bang for your buck. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: I love my HD camcorder
customer_reviews.text: My Contour Roam goes with me everywhere. I love it for water sports because it's waterproof and I don't need an extra case for it. It is super compact. With the accessories I easily attach it to my bike helmet when biking. It's easy to download the video to my computer for editing. I like the HD quality of the video as well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: So close to 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! I like how versatile it is for being able to be mounted at any angle and the picture quality is amazing. The only reason I didn't give it more stars was because the free software that's available for "editing" the videos is pretty limited. Other than that, the camera is great. It's literally easy to use with just a flip of a switch to start recording. It even gives you audible sounds to let you know the camera has been turned on and then off (with the same easy single switch).
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but a lot of variability in pricing so shop carefully. Shipping was quick. Mounting the camera on my helmet required a separate mount, but it was cheap so no biggy. Pictures it takes are great and editing the configuration is simple even in Linux. No regrets
customer_reviews.author: C. Gregan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Action Recorder
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and shape of this recorder. GoPro might have a better video quality than it, but my major concern is the design and durability and Contour Roam really meets my need. I have been using it in paintball games and never worried about getting shots on it. I even used it for snorkeling once with the waterproof case and it worked really well. Too bad the company is now closed. My advise would be hurry up stock some of them before they are gone from the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ray W.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good value
customer_reviews.text: The camera works well, has a laser leveling feature that makes it possible to mount it at any angle on your bicycle and get a properly oriented image, and can be upgraded through instructions on the web so it works like a ContouROAM 2, with 60 fps (though the manufacturer says not to do this -- the camera can overheat -- but I doubt it.) So it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: jonawebb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my motorcycle helmet and took a spin around the block as soon as I got it...works better than i imagined..very pleased with it...got this around xmas for $115 ..saw other people got theres for $89 :( just saw its back up to $183 on here again so now i dont feel so bad anymore:)
customer_reviews.author: Jackhammer

customer_reviews.title: bought for military use
customer_reviews.text: Got for my brother in the military. He said it's one of the best for its price. Almost bought a band for him to wear it with but found out the Army already provides those. Also, had to purchase an additional SD card in order for him to be able to playback video or hold more than 4 hours at a time
customer_reviews.author: m Landowski

customer_reviews.title: so far good
customer_reviews.text: have only used a couple of times, but looks like it will be easy to use, lightweight, durable, and great picture. also got the waterproof case and so far so good underwater as well. software is fiddly, but works well. transaction smooth, shipping prompt.
customer_reviews.author: charles browning

customer_reviews.title: This is the best action video camera
customer_reviews.text: This video camera is an absolute b-o-m-b (in a good way) !!!! It is so light and its shape is unobtrusive which makes it easy to place. I use this one camera with several mounts (including a dash-cam) to cover all sorts of videoing opportunities. I can hardly wait to get a second Contour which will be the Contour Roam 2.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Go with the newer version that can connect to your smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Good quality (but a little fish-eyed) picture, not super easy to tell where center is on the yaw but the pitch is easy to find with the laser line. Newer versions have apps for connecting to smartphones and I would suggest you go with one of those for your own convenience.
customer_reviews.author: IronSmith

customer_reviews.title: I love this Cam!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For getting creative shots, this is the ticket. Battery has a good life, Video quality is good (though not very much indoors, though outdoors is where this camera really shines). Audio, is alright, but the cool angles make this a must have for making montages or mash-up vids. Very Happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: eek doggy

customer_reviews.title: Love my Contour
customer_reviews.text: Skied at Vail for two weeks with the Contour Roam. Met my expectations and then some. I ski in the trees and like the lower profile than the GoPro as branches hit the top of my helmet and I worried that it would be knocked off it's mount. The Contour worked great in the trees!
customer_reviews.author: windsolar

customer_reviews.title: Great video camera
customer_reviews.text: Small, sturdy, easy to operate, very good picture with sound. Picture quality adjusts very quickly from light to shade. Used it for mountain biking to show friends/family what I do in my spare time. Also took videos of my riding buddies and they loved it. Used helmet mount and with a little bit of vaseline on the mounting brackets, it slide on and off fine and held tight (other reviewers said this was an issue). Get the 32 gb card as it hold a hugh amount of video. No dislikes. For the price, I would highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: paul kalfus

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than a GO PRO and video is just as good! Rode it on my helmet while bike riding and it was great. Bought a waterproof case for it and that is also great! Pretty light and small, but most of all, seems pretty sturdy. I wouldn't recommend dropping it though.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W

customer_reviews.title: Contour Roam finds a home!
customer_reviews.text: For us motorcyclists who desire simplicity/ease of operation, this is the best hands free camera yet! I ride a sportbike and mounting options are limited for any camera. I mounted mine to my helmet for the best opportunity at panaromic views. The Contour Roam held up to the desert environment of Baja California all the way to Cabo San Lucas and back. The Contour Roam has one button operation with my riding gloves on! Battery life was more than sufficient. Uploading to my website was a snap.Only drawback was cleaning the lens due to the bugs. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: charles crockett

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my motorcycle helmet and it works great. I love watching the footage after a great motorcycle ride. It even works well at night. The only complaint I have is the website. I have not yet been able to share any of my footage and I can't event contact the company to help me diagnose the problem. Otherwise, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Yebo

customer_reviews.title: Video is ok
customer_reviews.text: The video is fine on this unit. Anything less than HD and it doesn't seem like it's that good but 1080 is fine. It's nice that you can just edit the text file on the camera to adjust settings. The clock however sucks. If it's important to you make sure you set it before using it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Lovin it great camera it really surprise me how good it is
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality, long battery life , tested it at day and night , it doesn't take too much charging time , I would recommend it for any body, cheap price , fast shipping all the way to Afghanistan, so far its the best deal I made on amazon
customer_reviews.author: BAGHDADI215

customer_reviews.title: Great cam
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for more than a year now and love it. Great video and battery life. I've used it under water carefully with no issues, and also with the waterproof case for wakeboarding. Excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: Stabile and good noise
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a few single-track talks. The wind is minimum yet you can speak at the camera and it picks up. Little to no shake. Get 8 minutes a gb on 1080p. I'm looking to wear this on a wrist strap for those crazy rides in Vegas
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: ContourRoam HD
customer_reviews.text: pros: camera is light and mounts on just about anything with the provided attachments, 90 shift left or right is very usedfull Cons: occasional line in video when recording in direct sunlight...but seriously not a big problem. Very good camera indead, I purchased the waterproof case as well for diving and the head band. Trully great pictures and video.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. G

customer_reviews.title: Nerdy but lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to enjoy having this camera with me as I did during a recent week-long skiing trip. It's really easy to setup and operate (even with thick gloves). It is especially fun to watch later -- great way to capture memories and fun moments. The hardware is quite durable and watertight -- no problems after multiple collisions with branches or submersion into deep powder. If you end up buying the camera, remember that you will need about 2GB per 1hr worth of recording even in the lower resolution (which is good enough for viewing on the laptop screen). I recommend at least an 8 or 16GB card for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kartal

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was the worst
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself was awesome and I am glad I found it for around 100. The packaging however was piss-poor. When I opened the brown box there was a bunch of typing paper used as stuffing and the Contour box was taped everywhere and it was yellow like it had been sitting somewhere forever, and had a sour smell. It took me 15 mins to open the Contour box to finally get the camera. I do not plan on buying anything else from wasaveyou$ due to the packaging. When I pay money for something nice, I expect it to be packaged nice. So 5/5 for the camera and 1/5 for packaging.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: I dig this helmet camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this helmet for whenever I go on patrol in Afghanistan. The set up was pretty simple (despite it taking me a while to figure out you have to push up on the door in the back to get it to open). Other than that, set up was easy. Had to cut off a portion of my helmet cover and file the rough exterior of my ACH a little to get it onto a smooth surface, but it was all in all pretty simple. Looking forward to taking this bad boy out.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use, the video is adequate, and it seems durable. I've been using mine with a suction cup mount in the windshield of my truck. Only one button to mess with to turn it on, or off. I put a 32gb card in it
customer_reviews.author: OldPhart4u

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera. It's fisheye lens is pretty cool and it's clarity is amazing. We use it for winch operations during bush fires. Terrific piece of gear not only for allowing others to see what we do, but helps cover my butt against false or inaccurate statements or mishaps ( gawd forbid I should ever have one).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. William Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Take great video and so simple
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of this camera. I'm not a professional video editor, but just wanted something to capture my rides while out mountain biking with little fuss. This was it. Slide the button to start recording, and slide back when done. So frickin' easy. Uploading videos to the computer is simple as well. If I can do, anybody can.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Palmer

customer_reviews.title: OK but
customer_reviews.text: The instructions included were horrible. Trouble shooting was absent - online trouble shooting was only so-so. It is not a "plug n play" type media storage device and as such should include more detailed instructions. I had to install Storyteller 3 times in order for it to finally work correctly. Also, it would have been nice to note that a microSD card was required just to get started. Perhaps it is (my husband bought this), but that should be in BOLD so it can be ordered or purchased at the time of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Duckworth

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it love it
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an inexpensive, high quality camera to capture your adventures then grab this camera. I've been using mine for a few months now and have had no issues with it. The software is easy and intuitive and the camera works great producing high quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: dbbray

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what I was expecting; small, light, robust video recorder. I was disapointed in the amount of time it takes to recharge (although this is in the specs so it wasn't a surprise) 1 hour for 80% of the battery and about 3-4 hours for the last 20%. My only complaint while small is that there are no instructions on opening the back panel to access the memory slot/usb port. I figured it out eventually and is simple to open once I did.
customer_reviews.author: Jinko

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a waterproof camera without a having to put it inside of a case this is the camera. Also it doesn't have the fisheye near as bad as the leading brand, you really have to have it off center a lot to get the fisheye.
customer_reviews.author: M. Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for when I am shooting competition. It mounted securely to my hearing protection and it records great! The cool thing is I can adjust the camera angle so it works with the angle of the hearing protection.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Weier

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: The camera has really high res, i use it to film my biking at Davis, california. the roads kind of cause the camera to shake so unless the road is nicely paved, expect some shaking to get caught on film. overall, the camera is very easy to use. i did not know that it doesnt come with a microsd card and i had to wait another week before i could use it because i had to buy my own sd card. it works well but i wish it came with better mounting equipment esp. because this camera isnt cheap!
customer_reviews.author: JaeGuan

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CAM WOULD BUY IT AGAIN THANKS THIS CAM IS BY FAR ONE OF THE BEST OUT THERE THE ONLY THING I SEE AS A SET BACK IS IT HAS TO BE HOOKED UP TO THE COMPUTER TO LOOK AT VIDEO...OTHER THAN THAN ITS A GREAT CAMERA
customer_reviews.author: DRAGON

customer_reviews.title: Really Good except battery life
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera for the reasons it is meant for. I bought it thinking I could use the still picture feature to make long time lapse videos. The battery life is 3-4 hours even when taking stills. I assume the camera is recording like normal, but only saves a few frames. I tried plugging it in while taking stills, but it would interrupt the process. I contacted Contour and they told be to get one of the dedicated chargers. I think the cable is different. I was glad to find out that it worked, but did cost an extra $30.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Great for bikes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband got me one, so I turned around and got him one! We love them for our bicycles. We don't do fancy things on our road bike, but we still like them to record some of our special rides. They are not hard to figure out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Knight

customer_reviews.title: Wish they would have kept going.
customer_reviews.text: Better form factor than Go Pro, easier to control and set up. Playback and file manipulation is easier. Don't understand why they gave up. I'll buy more when the price drops after the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Bufftester

customer_reviews.title: Why go pro?
customer_reviews.text: Why go pro when this does essentially the same job in a sleeker package, and easier to use. Literally slide the record/on switch forward and go. Also water proof to one meter without a case.
customer_reviews.author: henry huynh

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift My Husband Received from Me This Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My husband acted like a little kid when he opened this present. He's already bought 5-6 accessories for it, and has planned an extensive Air Soft expedition with his friends. And he's planning on bringing the camera with him,
customer_reviews.author: Alison in CA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really great camera. Good microphone, imaging, and camera functionality in mounting abilities and recording. Very sturdy too. I do recommend a large memory card. Battery does just fine.
customer_reviews.author: GTWR60000

customer_reviews.title: Works, but MOV ruins it..
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but unfortunately only uses MOV format (blech). Also has started to get a few dead pixels.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I use it with a helmet mount when riding my motorcycle to capture all the wonderful things and nature around me while I'm riding.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Helmet and Bike Mounted Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great performance in camera and video mode. Long lasting battery. Easy to use. Only thing to note is product performance severely deteriorates in negative temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Fireblade87

customer_reviews.title: Perfors as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The videos are just a tad choppy, I guess the more expensive higher fps versions would be better, but also much larger files to manage. The video files are huge as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Vetbird

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: absolutly no complaints about this unit , ive been using it on my 12 gauge for about six months and its still ticking , it takes beautiful videos and with a 32 gig sd card , it,ll record for 8 hours on the high def setting
customer_reviews.author: john67

customer_reviews.title: ContourRoam
customer_reviews.text: Best action sports camera for the money, i got it for $100. This can compete with any go pro except the black version. Best use: for Paintball; low profile, easy on/off switch, records 1080p HD.
customer_reviews.author: Phi Vuong

customer_reviews.title: Started odd Good
customer_reviews.text: it worked fine at first, but after a few months, it quit. don't know if stopped because it road on the seat of my truck or if it is a poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Geo Jr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good recordings
customer_reviews.text: The camera works well although the lens is such a wide angle that if mounted on the side of a motorcycle helmet the visor is very prominent in the video. Love the power/record switch. The included rotating surface mount is junk! Sticks to the helmet well, but had to super glue the rotating mechanism in place so it wouldn't rotate with the weight of the camera. The Storyteller Ap that you download to view, edit, & share leaves a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: a believer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. Worked properly. Shipped item quickly and packaged well. Would refer item to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Powell

customer_reviews.title: all about it
customer_reviews.text: i like this more than go pro because it has a slimmer profile. super easy to use. and water resistant more that it says. i've taken it down 15 meters diving without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this camera to shoot some mountain passes on a longboard trip n the quality of video I cannot complain about. The mount it came with was sturdy enough to handle crashes and rag dolls at 40 mph while it was attached to my helmet. So easy to turn on n off. Bought the suction mount with it and that thing isn't ever going anywhere when attached to the hood. Except I almost sliced my thumb off trying to take the camera off of the mount. Very pleased with the price n purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lesnav

customer_reviews.title: contour roam HD camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, its water resistance a lot of accessories to accommodate the use for it, tough built. I use this camera for my motorcycle, its very easy to use, light weight , and ones you have the free software installed in the computer its easy to change the options between just taking continuous pictures or recording in 720p ,920p, and full HD. Also , it doesn't come with a memory card, I recommend buying a microSD 32gb card for high usage, this will give you recording in 1080p about 240min.
customer_reviews.author: chrisGD.

customer_reviews.title: Very good and small camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera like gift for one of my colleagues that was leaving the country, after the advice of one of my friends that had already the same camera. Both of them are really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: sonia84dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Video
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek and mounted on a paintball gun its hard to tell if its a sight or a camera, so it doesn't interfere with your scenario ball, much less Bulky than the go pro, all in all I love it
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rodd

customer_reviews.title: Sucked
customer_reviews.text: The camcorder never worked properly. Had to return it. Waste of time and money. Would not recommend this camera to anyone who isn't a camcorder nerd.
customer_reviews.author: L.S. Cauldwell

customer_reviews.title: This camera is great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my 150cc motor scooter. I Then drove the Dragon at Deals Gap with it and got good video. Very pleased with this product and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Contour ROAM HD Camcorder
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised with my gear, car, motorcycle and other attachments. I would recommend to a friend. Shipping was fast accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter McShooter

customer_reviews.title: great camera, loved using it.
customer_reviews.text: worked great, owned it for quite a long time a little big for paintball, I would rather have the replayXD but this is super nice for everything else, used it on a trip and the push to record feature is something a love.
customer_reviews.author: jhonatan Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Had for a year No issues
customer_reviews.text: Learned about this camera from friends and love it.. Had this camera over a year as a dash mount and no issues.. Roam 2 is out now, time to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This has done everything I've expected it to so far. It has more varied adjustments than I was expecting, and has more software available from the website. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M.

customer_reviews.title: First GEN works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for recording paintball games and i have the flat surface mount on my goggles. I also purchased the picatinny rail mount and i have to say that I LOVE THIS CAMERA! The original i got did have a hardware problem and did not record at full volume but i sent it to Contour in my state of WA for an warrantied RMA and i recieved my new one and it is working better than ever!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: I bouth this cam with the intent of videoing me flying my rc planes. I needed a hands free cam that could be turned on and off easily...works great for close up and maybe even up to about 200 feet away but after that its hard to see the plane.... It is a wide angle cam so I was expecting it to work far away... I have a cam person as well that videos the far way shots...Love the one button on and off/video ability..
customer_reviews.author: John Hoch

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Its one of the best out there. it has a 180 degree angle, plus and amazing resolution. it works anywhere even under water.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Equestrian Activities!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera for crosscountry! It's hard not to have a screen or peek hole, but once you find the right angle on the helmet mount, you are golden! I haven't optimized on mic sensitivity yet, but I'll usually put music on my videos for effect anyway. This was only the second time I used this camera. I have also mounted this camera on a little monopod stuck in the ground for dressage, and the 170 degree lens covered the entire arena. Independence!
customer_reviews.author: Nan

product_meta.title: ContourROAM Hands-free HD Camcorder
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 



The ContourROAM is the ideal camera for a fun and easy experience capturing your adventures anywhere life takes you. Just slide the record switch and you’re instantly filming beautiful HD video. The award-winning design is tough, compact, waterproof to one meter, and versatile which means you can use your ContourROAM anywhere, anytime and capture all the action you want.

Record up to 8 hours of 1080p video (12 hours of 720p video) on a 32GB MicroSD card, then use the free Contour Storyteller App to easily transfer and share your videos with your friends and the contour.com community (32GB SD card sold seperately). 





CONTOURROAM PRODUCT FEATURES:
EASY TO USE 
Shooting video should be simple and fun. With the ContourROAM, we’ve introduced one-step recording. Just slide the record switch, and you’re instantly filming. Easy as that. It’s the ideal camera for a fun, stress-free experience capturing your adventures anywhere life takes you. The ContourROAM is incredibly intuitive and easy to use, with a sleek, award-winning design and a laser that helps you level the camera and get the right shot every time.

BEAUTIFUL HD VIDEO
The ContourROAM records the action with a 170º super wide-angle lens, capturing all the backgrounds and peripheral moments that can be missed with a narrower field of view. Sophisticated camera technology automatically adjusts the exposure and white balance, ensuring crisp, beautiful video every time. You can choose between three different video resolutions, 720p, 960p and 1080p, or shoot 5 megapixel photos enabling you greater creative flexibility. 

WATERPROOF
No need to worry about your camera surviving your next big water adventure, the ContourROAM is waterproof to one meter. A sealed gasket protects the camera’s insides, allowing you to catch the action under water or in the rain, sleet, or snow. For full submersion sports, such as scuba diving or wakeboarding the ContourROAM Waterproof Case provides totally dryness up to 60 meters beneath the surface.

SUPER TOUGH
Mud. Dirt. Snow. Rain. The places you roam can be some of the roughest places on earth. The ContourROAM is made to withstand encounters with everything from eating mud puddles, to monster barrels at Teahupoo, to drops down the Khumbu Icefall. The rugged aluminum body withstands serious abuse, while the waterproof design keeps everything safe and dry up to one meter. 




ADDITIONAL PRODUCT FEATURES
CLEAR AUDIO
The video is only part of the story. Contour's built-in, multi-direction microphone captures the ambient audio that underscores all the action.

HOURS OF VIDEO
Available up to 32GB the MicroSD card system captures up to eight hours of footage when shooting in full 1080p mode, and can be quickly swapped out so you don’t miss a minute of the action. MicroSD cards sold separately.

EASY DOWNLOADS
Our free, custom Storyteller App easily downloads and helps you assemble your video footage via Mac or PC. Once you’re done, it takes just a few clicks to upload and share your adventure on contour.com and other sites for your friends to see.

SIMPLE TO SHARE
Once you've got the story or segment assembled, we provide a community for sharing your video through contour.com, and sites such as Facebook, Twitter or other user-based communities.






VIDEO FORMATS
Video Format Resolution Frame Rate 
Full HD 1080p 1920 x 1080 30 fps To capture those awesome moments in the highest resolution available. Tall HD 960p 1280 x 960 30 fps For those sports like surfing that are better suited to a taller image. Contour 720p 1280 x 720 30 fps When space on your card is at a premium and you need to record that last epic adventure. 5MP Still Photo 2592 X 1944 1, 3, 5, 10, 30 or 60 sec When you want to freeze frame the action, the photo mode is your perfect shot. You can pick from 6 rates to best capture that moment. 




WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
 

ContourROAM Camera Rotating Surface Mounts Profile Mount USB Cable

CONTOUR RECOMMENDED ACCESSORIES

 ACCESSORIES FOR EVERY SEASON 
 Shop Contour Recommended Accessories by sport: 

 WINTER SPORTS 
 AUTOSPORTS/MOTORCROSS 
 MOUNTAIN BIKING 
 HUNTING/FISHING 
 SURF 
 UNDER WATER 
 PAINTBALL/TACTICAL 






CONTOURROAM FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:
1: WHAT IS NEW WITH THIS CAMERA?
ContourROAM is designed for enthusiasts in active settings, is easy to use and has several new features:
+ Waterproof
+ Built in battery
+ Instant On Record Switch
+ Rotating lens with Laser Line
+ Built in Tripod screw mount.


2: HOW WATERPROOF IS CONTOURROAM?
Designed and tested to the IPX7 standard rating, ContourROAM can withstand continuous immersion in water 1m deep for up to 30 minutes. IPX7 is a technical definition of waterproofness, in everyday terms usage ContourROAM’s low-profile design withstands everyday bad weather and swimming. A waterproof case is available for more extreme water sports such as surfing and scuba diving.


3: IS THERE A WATERPROOF CASE FOR CONTOURROAM, AND HOW WATERPROOF IS IT?
Yes, a waterproof case has been specifically designed for ContourROAM. This case is waterproof to the following ratings:

PX6:
This means the case can withstand high pressure water jets. In everyday usage terms this means the case is resistant to water pushing on the housing, such as would be experienced in kayaking, surfing and other active water sports.

IPX8-60M:
This means the case can withstand the pressure of being underwater to a depth of 60m. In everyday usage terms this means the case can be used for recreational SCUBA diving.


4: HOW DOES THE INSTANT ON RECORD SWITCH WORK?
ContourROAM has no dedicated Power button. Instead, the Instant On Record Switch powers the camera on and immediately starts recording. This helps to conserve battery power as the camera does not have to be powered on in a ‘standby mode’ to be ready to record. The result is better battery life, and an easy-to-use camera. Best of all, there's no guess work in whether the camera is on or not.


5: WHAT IS THE 270 DEGREE ROTATION?
The lens-ring will rotate from -90 degrees to +180 degrees. This means ContourROAM can be mounted on its side or upside down, greatly increasing the places the camera can be mounted.


6: WHAT IS THE LASER LINE?
The Laser Line is a single laser beam that is projected as a horizontal line from the camera’s rotating lens. It lets you make sure the rotating lens is aligned with the horizon to give you the best shot.


7: HOW WELL DOES THE BUILT-IN BATTERY PERFORM?
By building the battery in, our engineers could maximize battery size, reliability, and waterproofness. Because the camera is not powered on until the Instant On Record Switch is slid forward, ContourROAM maximizes battery power. Recording at 720p our tests show the camera can record 3.5 hours of video. Length of charge will depend on how you use the camera. Connected to a computer via USB, the battery will reach approximately 80% charge in one hour, and a full charge in 3 to 4 hours.


8: HOW DOES THE STATUS BUTTON WORK?
When you press and release the Status Button, the camera will power on briefly and display its Battery level and available Memory. The Laser Line will also light up. After 15 seconds, the camera will power off again to conserve power.


9: WHAT SORT OF THREAD DOES THE TRIPOD MOUNT HAVE?
The tripod thread mount is a 1/4-20 thread. This is the standard one used on most consumer cameras.
feature_bullets: Aluminum body is designed to take abuse and keep on filming
Full HD video with 8hrs record time at 1080p with 32gb Micro SD card (sold seperately)
170 degree super wide angle lens with auto adjust for exposure and white balance
